message: Let's start with a fair split, no need to negotiate too hard.
You wanted a fair split, but I think I'm worth more than you.
You think you're worth more, but I'm not convinced. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm still not convinced you're getting a fair share. You're going to have to do better than that.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better share to make up for the inflation.
You're still not getting enough. I'm not budging on this one.
I'm desperate, Bob. I need a better deal to survive the inflation.
You're really scraping the bottom of the barrel now. This is my final offer.
